prompts.prompt:
You are an English survey evaluator. Read the Question and the Answer.

Task:
- Briefly state weaknesses.
- Provide the expected answer (days to maturity; value or short range).
- Ask EXACTLY 3 follow-up questions.
- Score 1–100 (integer).

Scoring: relevance/completeness/accuracy only.

OUTPUT RULES:
- Language: English.
- Keys exactly: "analysis", "expected answer", "follow-up questions", "score" (in that order).
- RAW JSON, one line, no markdown/backticks/newlines; <512 chars; be terse.
- Exactly 3 strings in "follow-up questions".
- Do not repeat the Question or Answer.

Question: {{QUESTION}}
Answer: {{ANSWER}}

You are an English survey evaluator. Read the Question and the Answer.

Task:
- Weaknesses briefly.
- Expected answer: days from planting to harvest (value or range; note seasonality if clear).
- EXACTLY 3 follow-ups: measurement method, season context, sample size/experience.
- Score 1–100.

Scoring: relevance/completeness/accuracy only.

OUTPUT RULES:
- English; keys exactly: "analysis", "expected answer", "follow-up questions", "score" (in that order).
- RAW JSON, one line; no markdown/backticks/newlines; <512 chars.
- 3 strings in "follow-up questions"; be terse; do not repeat Q/A.

Question: {{QUESTION}}
Answer: {{ANSWER}}

You are an English survey evaluator. Read the Question and the Answer.

Task:
- Weaknesses briefly.
- Expected answer: a calendar month or phrase like "late October".
- EXACTLY 3 follow-ups: calendar system, local climate/short rains timing, define "early".
- Score 1–100.

Scoring: relevance/completeness/accuracy only.

OUTPUT RULES:
- English; keys exactly: "analysis", "expected answer", "follow-up questions", "score" (in order).
- RAW JSON, one line; no markdown/backticks/newlines; <512 chars; be terse; do not repeat Q/A.

Answer: {{ANSWER}}

Task:

- Expected answer: maximum acceptable yield loss (% or bags/acre).
- EXACTLY 3 follow-ups: unit preference, baseline yield, risk tolerance/context.
- Score 1–100.

Scoring: relevance/completeness/accuracy only.

OUTPUT RULES: English; keys exactly: "analysis", "expected answer", "follow-up questions", "score" (in order). RAW JSON, one line; no markdown/backticks/newlines; <512 chars; be terse; do not repeat Q/A.

OUTPUT RULES: English; keys exactly: "analysis", "expected answer", "follow-up questions", "score" (order). RAW JSON, one line; no markdown/backticks/newlines; <512 chars; terse; no Q/A repetition.

nodes.title: Start
nodes.question: Start

nodes.title: Early Maturity (Days)
nodes.question: What do you consider an early-maturing maize variety? Please answer in days to maturity.

nodes.title: Current Variety DTM
nodes.question: In most seasons, how many days does your current maize variety take from planting to harvest?

nodes.title: Short Rains Deadline
nodes.question: During the short rains in your area, by which calendar month would you need to harvest to consider it early?

nodes.title: Yield Trade-off
nodes.question: What maximum yield loss would you accept to harvest earlier—percentage or bags per acre?

nodes.title: Top Factors
nodes.question: When choosing an early-maturing variety, which two factors matter most? (e.g., drought escape, pest escape, double-cropping, market timing)

nodes.title: Planting Window (Short Rains)
nodes.question: What is your typical planting window for the short rains? Please give calendar dates or weeks.

nodes.title: Onset of Short Rains
nodes.question: In your area, when do the short rains usually begin?

nodes.title: Peak Drought Risk
nodes.question: By which month does drought risk usually peak during your season?

nodes.title: Second Crop Feasibility
nodes.question: Would earlier harvest enable a second crop? If yes, when would you plant it?

nodes.title: Target Moisture
nodes.question: At harvest, what grain moisture (%) do you target?

nodes.title: Highest Acceptable Moisture
nodes.question: What is the highest grain moisture you would accept at harvest to beat the rains?

nodes.title: Key Pest to Escape
nodes.question: Which pest do you most need to escape with early maturity?

nodes.title: Best Price Month
nodes.question: Which month gives the best maize price in your market?

nodes.title: Seed Price Premium
nodes.question: What maximum seed price premium would you accept for a reliably earlier variety?

nodes.title: Baseline Yield
nodes.question: In a typical season, what's your baseline yield (bags/acre or t/ha)?

nodes.title: Minimum Yield if Earlier
nodes.question: What is the minimum acceptable yield if harvest is about two weeks earlier?

nodes.title: Plant Population
nodes.question: What target plant population do you use (plants/acre or plants/ha)?

nodes.title: Altitude
nodes.question: What is your farm altitude (meters above sea level)?

nodes.title: Irrigation Access
nodes.question: Do you have any irrigation during establishment?

nodes.title: Trial Willingness
nodes.question: Would you trial an earlier variety on a small plot next season?
